entities.name: hairy legs
entities.description: The creatures have six immensely long, hairy legs.

entities.name: black pincers
entities.description: The front two legs are clutching Harry tightly below a pair of shining black pincers.

entities.name: creatures
entities.description: There are multiple creatures mentioned in the text, carrying Ron and Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is being carried by one of the creatures.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang, a dog, is fighting to free himself from a monster.

entities.name: monsters
entities.description: There are multiple monsters mentioned in the text, carrying Fang and Harry.

entities.name: forest
entities.description: The creatures are moving into the very heart of the Forest.

entities.name: spiders
entities.description: Spiders are swarming over the leaves and on the ground in the hollow.

relationships.description: The creatures are carrying Ron behind Harry.
The creatures are carrying Harry in front of Ron.
Fang is being attacked by a monster.
